a, b = map(int, input().split())
print(a + b)

# Get input
n = int(input())
a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

# Get the largest number of days he can train
days = 0
for i in range(n):
    if a[i] > days:
        days += 1

print(days)

# Get input
n = int(input())
a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

# Get the largest number of days he can train
days = 0
for i in range(n-1):
    if a[i] > days:
        days += 1

print(days)


def main():
    pass

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    day = 1
    for i in range(n):
        if day < a[i]:
            day = a[i]
        day += 1 
    print(day-1) 

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
